properties.description: Orders and Details are in same colletion but each has own document type attribute.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select [Orders].orderID , 
OrderDate, 
FirstName, 
LastName, 
Address,
City, 
State, 
PostalCode, 
Country, 
Phone, 
SMSOptin, 
SMSStatus, 
Orders.Email, 
ReceiptUrl,
Total, 
PaymentTransactionId,
HasBeenShipped,
OrderDetailId,
ProductId,
Quantity,
UnitPrice
from orders
    join [dbo].[OrderDetails]
	on  [dbo].[OrderDetails].orderid = [dbo].[Orders].orderid
FOR JSON AUTO
